Sentencas: In this paper, an analytical model of a micro solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system fed by butane is introduced and analyzed in order to optimize its exergetic efficiency.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant

Sentencas: The micro SOFC system is equipped with a partial oxidation (POX) reformer, a vaporizer, two pre-heaters, and a post-combustor.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant

Sentencas: A one-dimensional (1D) polarization model of the SOFC is used to examine the effects of concentration overpotentials, activation overpotentials, and ohmic resistances on cell performance.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant

Sentencas: This ID polarization model is extended in this study to a two-dimensional (2D) fuel cell model considering convective mass and heat transport along the fuel cell channel and from the fuel cell to the environment.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant

Sentencas: The influence of significant operational parameters on the exergetic efficiency of the micro SOFC system is discussed.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant

Sentencas: The present study shows the importance of an exergy analysis of the fuel cell as part of an entire thermodynamic system (transportable micropowerplant) generating electric power.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant
Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant
Exergy analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell micropowerplant
